page.title: 04Local transport
page.content: Types of{transport}are, buses{,water {bus,}and{train.}Bus fare is very cheap.When you get over sixty you get a free bus pass .The double decker bus holds 77 people.Seven bus services run through our area regularly.Behind our school field there is a rail way line it would have shut down by now.The only thing that keeps it open are the coal trains which run through to the power stations.The passenger train goes from Doncaster to Sheffield and Rotherham via Mexborough.The European Economic Community has widened the canal so that sea going barges can come through Conisbrough to Rotherham.Water bus takes people to Doncaster,Sprotbrough and Mexbrough in summer.
